## bdk steps i-exec

I exec <command> in <reference>

### Synopsis

Executes the given command in a shell in the referenced pod and default container.

```
bdk steps i-exec [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  
  When I exec "echo helloworld" in pod

```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for i-exec
```
